feed.title: GitHub AppleScript Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of AppleScript in GitHub

entry.title: alldritt/AppleScriptLibraries
entry.summary:
A collection of AppleScript libraries.

AppleScript Libraries

Here is a collection of AppleScript libraries which I use regularly which others may find useful. This code also forms the basis for a series of blog posts on markalldritt.com.

Libraries

  • MarksLib

  • MastodonLib

  • MarkdownLib

  • DiscourseLib

The Future

I hope to add additional libraries to this repository as time goes on. If you want to improve on my work, Pull Requests are always welcome. Please direct questions to the Late Night Software Support Forum.
